author: andreasmyth
msg: Disabled testTwoWayMessageLoss as it fails intermittently.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Removed RMFileStore as it was only a dummy implementation of the RMStore interface.
Changed default store class in RM configuration to be null (making no persistence the default) instead of using a dummy store.
Re-enabled testTwoWayNonAnonymousMaximumSequenceLength2 test in RM SequenceTest by correcting expectations w.r.t. number and type of inbound messages.

author: ajaypaibir
msg: Fix for the intermittent xml pars exceptions for oneway operations, Bug 305054 . The DocumentBuilder used by XMLBinding is now created per invocation rather than sharing it across invocation. Ideally should be a per thread instance.
